metadata.Title: CVE-2017-2816 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the tag parsing functionality of LibOFX 0.9.11. A specially crafted OFX file can cause a write out of bounds resulting in a buffer overflow on the stack. An attacker can construct a malicious OFX file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: libofx: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
